meanings.definition: The quality of being outgoing and sociable.
meanings.sent1: Her extraversions made her the life of the party.
meanings.sent2: His extraversions helped him make friends easily.
meanings.sent3: The extraversions of the puppy charmed everyone at the park.
meanings.sent4: His extraversions were like rays of sunshine in a gloomy room.
meanings.sent5: The extraversions of the flowers brightened up the garden.

meanings.definition: The act of directing one's interests and energies outward.
meanings.sent1: She focused her extraversions on volunteering for the community.
meanings.sent2: His extraversions towards sports led him to join the local team.
meanings.sent3: The extraversions of the students in the science fair were impressive.
meanings.sent4: Her extraversions were like a river flowing towards new experiences.
meanings.sent5: The extraversions of the wind carried the scent of fresh flowers.
